{{Infobox Berry |name = #64 Apicot |image = [[File:Apicot.png]] |caption = This is a very, very mystifying Berry. There is no telling how it can be used, or what may happen if it is used. |growtime = 24h 0m 0s |harvest = 0.5 berries |replant = 0% |mutation = 0.001% |points = 15,000 |flavor =
*10 spicy *30 dry *0 sweet *0 bitter *30 sour }} '''Apicot''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by having at least one empty plot and at least 23 [[Chilan]] on the field. Pok√©mon #484 (Palkia) must be caught to unlock this berry. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 3 hours || 6 hours || 12 hours || 1 day - 5 days |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:ApicotTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:ApicotTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||

5 days ||
--- |- ! Mulch or Sprayduck | 16 hours -
80 hours ||
192 mulch |- ! Mulch & Sprayduck | 10 hours 40 mins -
53 hours 20 mins ||
128 mulch |} == Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Apicot berries.
